name: Volume 1 - RPG Maker XP + Anima Characters
name_original: Volume 1 - RPG Maker XP + Anima Characters
description:
These are assets for the RPG Maker XP! They come in an adorable chibi format and represent the main cast from the manga by Natsumi Mukai, +Anima!

In +Anima, children who die in the wilderness may be rescued by an animal spirit, known as an Anima, and they get save by them by getting their powers and transforming one part of their body into that of the specific animal.  

They're made specificly for fanprojects, and are not for Commercial Use! 

Hope you enjoy!
developers: a rose a day keeps the doctors away
